column1: Baby Barnaby's////This is one of my favorite places for brunch! Heads up
column2: you have to put your name on a list oustide if there's a wait
column3: so don't stand around and wait to be seated. They go off of the list. I got their Migas plate with chorizo. First of all
column4: their potatoes are the best potatoes ever! Super crispy
column6: and the perfect size. The eggs
column8: and chorizo were cooked to perfection. The service is wonderful
column9: the servers are very friendly and check on you often. You get a pitcher of water on your table so theres no reason your cup will be empty.
